name: Seeker Bolt
desc: You fire a large solid bolt of lightning that locks on to a creature within range and moves 30 feet closer. At the start of each of your turns, if it has not collided with a creature or object, it moves 30 feet closer to the target. On impact with anything, it deals 3d10 lightning damage. Seeker Bolt's damage is reduced to 1d10 if it hits a creature within 30 feet.
